thread.title: The Coolpad Note 5 Lite goes on sale today via Amazon at 12 pm, yours for Rs 8,199
thread.title_full: The Coolpad Note 5 Lite goes on sale today via Amazon at 12 pm, yours for Rs 8,199

title: The Coolpad Note 5 Lite goes on sale today via Amazon at 12 pm, yours for Rs 8,199
text:
Home Android Phones The Coolpad Note 5 Lite goes on sale today via Amazon at... The Coolpad Note 5 Lite goes on sale today via Amazon at 12 pm, yours for Rs 8,199 By   Note 5 Lite features an all-metal body, a 5-inch HD display, 3GB RAM and a 13MP camera” 
Last week, Coolpad launched its latest Note series smartphone dubbed the Note 5 Lite in India. Today, the phone will go on sale in the country for the very first time. The sale will start on Amazon India at 12 pm. Priced at Rs 8,199, the budget offering will be available in two colour variants – gold and grey.For the uninitiated, the Coolpad Note 5 Lite ( first impressions ) features an all-metal unibody design and a rear-mounted fingerprint sensor. It comes with a 5-inch HD display, an 8MP front snapper with a dedicated flash, a 13MP rear shooter, a 1.0GHz quad-core MediaTek SoC, 3GB of RAM, 16GB storage, Andriod Marshmallow, 4G LTE, USB OTG and a 2,500mAh battery. Facebook Comments
